players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I'm shocked that Bob was killed! We need to figure out who among us is the mafioso. Since there's only one mafioso, we have a good chance if we work together and share our thoughts."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's work together to identify the mafioso. I have no reason to suspect anyone at this moment, but we should all share any suspicions or concerns we may have."

Diana: "Charlie seems very eager to work together, which could be genuine town behavior or a way to appear helpful while being mafia. Alice's silence is concerning - why wouldn't an innocent person want to help find the killer?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
